alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Val Verde County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amistad Acres, or 15 miles south of Comstock, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake View, Amistad Village, Black Brush Point, Amistad Acres, Box Canyon, Diablo East, Governors Landing, Long Point, Devils Shores, Pafford Crossing, 277 South Boat Ramp, San Pedro Canyon, 277 North Campground, Rough Canyon Recreation Area, Spur 406 Campground, Rock Quarry Campground, Salem Point, Devils River State Nat Area Big Satan and Lake Ridge Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
